commit.message:
Add disappearing animation to inspiration hint and make it unclickable

Changes:
- Made inspiration hint completely unclickable (pointerEvents: 'none')
- Removed onClick handler and cursor pointer
- Added smooth 'soaking into paper' animation on typing:
  - Fade out (opacity 1 â†’ 0)
  - Slight shrink (scale 0.95)
  - Gentle upward movement (translateY -3px)
  - Blur effect (blur 2px)
- 800ms duration with cubic-bezier easing for natural feel
- State management for animation timing
